data_description.name: The name of the modbus hub. Must be unique.

auto_scheduling.title: Auto scheduling configuration
auto_scheduling.description: Select a weather entity and provide PV system configuration.

data_description.weather_entity_id: Weather entity of which to retrieve the forecast.

data_description.nominal_power_wp: The total Wp of the PV system
data_description.orientation: The direction the PV panels are facing towards. For panels that are placed East/West, select 'EW' for 50/50 distribution of the total Wp.
data_description.annual_efficiency_decrease: The annual efficiency decrease in percent. Leave at `0` if unknown.
data_description.installation_date: The (approximate) installation date to calculate the current system efficiency.

data_description.dhw_boiler_volume: The DHW boiler volume in L
data_description.dhw_heat_loss_rate: The DHW boiler heat loss rate in Watts
data_description.dhw_boiler_energy_label: DHW boiler energy label. Used if heat loss rate is `0`, otherwise ignored.

data_description.baudrate: Speed of the serial connection, higher speed gives better performance.
data_description.bytesize: Data size in bits of each byte.
data_description.method: Method of the connection to modbus.
data_description.port: Serial port or USB device where your modbus device is connected to your Home Assistant.

data_description.host: IP address or hostname of your modbus device, e.g. `192.168.1.1`
